General.Name: Porton Fine Chemicals Ltd
General.Description: Porton Pharma Solutions Ltd. manufactures and supplies small molecule active pharmaceutical ingredients and drug intermediates, dosage forms, and biologics to the pharmaceutical companies. The company was formerly known as Porton Fine Chemicals Ltd. and changed its name to Porton Pharma Solutions Ltd. in January 2018. Porton Pharma Solutions Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.

0.Name: Mr. Rong  Tao
0.Title: Vice Chairman, Deputy GM & Sec. to the Board
